Property.Name: DATA_WIDTH_p
Property.Description: Number of bits of input data which are processed by FIR primitive

Property.Name: COEFF_WIDTH_p
Property.Description: Number of bits of taps property values which are processed by FIR primitive

Property.Name: LATENCY_p
Property.Description: Number of clock cycles between a valid input and a valid output

Property.Name: GROUP_DELAY_p
Property.Description: Number of valid inputs before a valid output is given
